message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its unique features and potential, I'm asking for $2,000,000. I'm open to discussing this further if you have any questions.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a price of $1,500,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
